ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and your movements with those who prostrate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And your movements among those who bow in homage to God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and observes your movements among those who prostrate themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: or move during your prostration with the worshippers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And watches your movements among those who prostrate in prayer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And your movements among those who fall prostrate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And your turning over and over among those who prostrate themselves before Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and when thou turnest about among those who bow.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And (seeth) thine abasement among those who fall prostrate (in worship).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and sees your movements among those who prostrate themselves:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And thy movements among those who fall prostrate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and your going about among those who prostrate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And thy movements among those who prostrate themselves,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And your movements among those who fall prostrate (along with you to Allah in the five compulsory congregational prayers).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and when you turn among those who prostrate themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And your devotions amidst the worshipers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And your movement among those who prostrate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:219] and your movements — in [performing] the [various] parts of prayer: standing, sitting, bowing and prostrating — among those who prostrate, those who perform the prayers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And (seeth) thine abasement among those who fall prostrate (in worship)) among those who pray in their bowing, prostration and standing up; it is also said that this means: in the loins of your forefathers.
